Key.French: You haven't eaten anything in awhile, You should find something to eat soon!
Key.English: You haven't eaten anything in awhile, You should find something to eat soon!

Key.Italian: E' da tempo che non mangi qualcosa, dovresti trovare qualcosa da mettere sotto i denti in fretta!

Key.English: You are starting to starve, you need to find something to eat otherwise you will die.

Key.Italian: Ti stai indebolendo, devi trovare qualcosa da mangiare o morirai.

Key.English: You are now starving to death, you will die very soon if you don't eat something

Key.Italian: Stai perdendo le forze, se non mangi qualcosa in fretta morirai.

Key.French: You haven't drank anything in awhile, You should find something to drink soon.

Key.English: You haven't drank anything in along time, you should find something to drink soon or you'll start to die from dehydration.

Key.Italian: E' troppo tempo che non bevi qualcosa, dovresti trovare qualcosa da bere o comincerai a disitratarti.

Key.English: You are now suffering from severe dehydration find something to drink quickly!
Key.German: Du bist am verdursten, du wirst sterben wenn du nichts zum trinken findest

Key.Italian: Stai soffrendo per una grave deidratazione, trova velocemente qualcosa da bere o morirai!

Key.Italian: Sei stato arrestato, sconta la tua pena. Se cercherai di rinascere o di riconnettere il tuo tempo aumenterà!

For being arrested you have lost the following licenses if you own them

Firearms License
Rebel License

Bei der Verhaftung haben sie folgende Lizenzen verloren

Rebellen Lizenz

A causa del tuo arresto hai perso le seguenti licenze, se le possedevi

Licenza Ribelle

Key.French: Do you want to add this item to your weapon or inventory? If you add it to your weapon your current existing attachment will be lost!
Key.English: Do you want to add this item to your weapon or inventory? If you add it to your weapon your current existing attachment will be lost!
Key.German: Möchtest du den Aufsatz zu deiner Waffe oder deinem Inventar hinzufügen? Wenn du es zur Waffe hinzufügst wird der vorhandene Aufsatz entfernt!

Key.Italian: Vuoi aggiungere questo oggetto alla tua arma o all'inventario? Se lo aggiungerai all'arma verrà rimosso l'eventuale accessorio già presente su di essa!

Key.French: You are not allowed to look into someone's backpack!
Key.English: You are not allowed to look into someone's backpack!

Key.Original: Vous n'êtes pas autorisé à regarder dans le sac à dos de quelqu'un!
Key.Italian: Non sei autorizzato a guardare negli zaini altrui!

Key.Italian: Non ti è permesso l'accesso a questo veicolo mentre è bloccato.

Key.English: This vehicle's trunk is in use, only one person can use it at a time.
Key.German: Auf diesen Kofferraum wird bereits zugegriffen.
Key.Original: Le coffre de ce véhicule est en cours d'utilisation, une seule personne peut l'utiliser à la fois.
Key.Italian: L'inventario di questo veicolo è in uso, può essere usato solo da una persona alla volta.

Key.Original: Échec à la création de dialogue

Key.Italian: Questo veicolo non è in grado di trasportare oggetti virtuali.

Key.Italian: Il veicolo non esiste o è stato distrutto.

Può supportare fino a %2 contenitori

Key.French: This house doesn't belong to anyone.
Key.English: This house doesn't belong to anyone
Key.Italian: Questa casa non appartiene a nessuno.

Key.French: This person is not online there for you cannot raid their house!
Key.English: This person is not online there for you cannot raid their house!
Key.Original: Cette personne n'est pas en ligne, vous ne pouvez pas perquisitionner cette maison!
Key.Italian: Questa persona non è online quindi non puoi perquisire la sua casa!

Key.Original: En train de casser la sérrure

Key.French: %1 your house is being raided by the cops!
Key.English: %1 your house is being raided by the cops!
Key.German: %1 dein Haus wird von der Polizei durchsucht!
Key.Original: %1 votre maison est perquisitionnée par les flics!
Key.Italian: %1 la Polizia si sta introducendo in casa tua!

Key.French: There is nothing in this house.
Key.English: There is nothing in this house.
Key.German: Es gibt nichts in diesem Haus.
Key.Original: Il n'y a rien dans cette maison
Key.Italian: In questa casa non c'è nulla.

Key.French: You went too far away from the house!
Key.English: You went too far away from the house!
Key.German: Du hast dich zu weit vom Haus entfernt!
Key.Original: Vous êtes parti trop loin de la maison!
Key.Italian: Sei andato troppo distante dalla casa!

Key.French: A house was raided and had $%1 worth of drugs / contraband.
Key.English: A house was raided and had $%1 worth of drugs / contraband.
Key.German: Ein Haus wurde durchsucht und man hat Drogen / Schmuggelware im Wert von $% gefunden.
Key.Original: Une maison a été perquisitionné et a $%1 de drogue / contrebande.
Key.Italian: Una casa è stata perquisita e sono stati trovati €%1 in materiali illegali.
Questa casa non contiene nulla d'illegale.

Key.Original: Fermeture de la maison veuiller patienter...

Key.French: Are you sure you want to sell your house? It will sell for: <t color='#8cff9b'>$%1</t>
Key.English: Are you sure you want to sell your house? It will sell for: <t color='#8cff9b'>$%1</t>.
Key.German: Bist Du sicher, dass du dein Haus verkaufen möchtest? Es wird für <t color='#8cff9b'>$%1</t> verkauft
Key.Original: Etes-vous sûr de vouloir vendre votre maison? Elle se vendra pour: <t color='#8cff9b'>$%1</t>
Key.Italian: Sei sicuro di voler vendere la tua casa? La venderai per: <t color='#8cff9b'>€1</t>

Key.French: There isn't a chopper on the helipad!
Key.English: There isn't a chopper on the helipad!
Key.German: Es ist kein Helikopter auf dem Landeplatz
Key.Original: Il n'y a pas d'hélicopter sur l'héliport
Key.Italian: Non c'è alcun elicottero sulla piazzola d'atterraggio

Key.French: You need $1,000 to service your chopper
Key.English: You need $1,000 to service your chopper
Key.German: Du benötigst $1,000 um deinen Helikopter zu reparieren
Key.Original: Vous devez $1000 pour l'entretien de votre hélico
Key.Italian: Necessiti di €1.000 per fare manutenzione al tuo elicottero

Key.French: The vehicle is no longer alive or on the helipad!
Key.English: The vehicle is no longer alive or on the helipad!
Key.German: Das Fahrzeug ist zerstört oder auf dem Helikopterlandeplatz!
Key.Original: Le véhicule est détruit ou n'est plus sur l'héliport!
Key.Italian: Il veicolo non è più attivo sulla piazzola d'atterraggio!

Key.French: Your chopper is now repaired and refuelled.
Key.English: Your chopper is now repaired and refuelled.
Key.German: Der Helicopter ist nun repariert und aufgetankt.
Key.Original: Votre hélicoptère est maintenant réparé et ravitaillé
Key.Italian: L'elicottero è stato riparato e rifornito di carburante.

Key.French: This can only be used on a vault.
Key.English: This can only be used on a vault.
Key.German: Das kann nur an einem Safe benutzt werden.
Key.Original: Cela ne peut être utilisé que sur un coffre-fort.
Key.Italian: Può essere usata solo sulla cassaforte.

Key.French: There is already a charge placed on this vault.
Key.English: There is already a charge placed on this vault
Key.German: Es gibt bereits eine Ladung am Safe
Key.Original: Une charge de dynamite est déjà placé sur ce coffre.
Key.Italian: C'è già una carica piazzata sulla cassaforte.

Key.French: A blasting charge has been placed on the federal reserves vault, You have till the clock runs out to disarm the charge!
Key.English: A blasting charge has been placed on the federal reserves vault, You have till the clock runs out to disarm the charge!
Key.German: Eine Sprengladung wurde am Safe angebracht, du hast Zeit bis die Uhr abläuft um die Ladung zu entschärfen!
Key.Original: Une charge de dynamite a été placé sur le coffre des réserves fédérales, Vous avez jusqu'au temps imparti pour désarmorcer la charge!
Key.Italian: Una carica esplosiva è stata piazzata sulla cassaforte della Riserva Federale, puoi cercare di disinnescarla prima che scada il tempo!

Key.French: The timer is ticking! Keep the cops away from the vault!
Key.English: The timer is ticking! Keep the cops away from the vault!
Key.German: Der Timer läuft! Halte die Polizei von Safe fern!
Key.Original: La minuterie est lancée! Gardez les flics loin de la bombe!
Key.Italian: Il tempo sta scorrendo! Tieni la polizia lontana dalla cassaforte!
La carica esplosiva è stata disinnescata!

Key.French: You are not looking at a house door.
Key.English: You are not looking at a house door.
Key.Original: Vous n'êtes pas en face de la porte.
Key.Italian: Non sei girato verso la porta di una casa.

Key.French: !!!!! SOMEONE IS BREAKING INTO THE FEDERAL RESERVE !!!!!!
Key.English: !!!!! SOMEONE IS BREAKING INTO THE FEDERAL RESERVE !!!!!!
Key.German: !!!!! JEMAND BRICHT IN DIE ZENTRALBANK EIN !!!!!!
Key.Original: !!!!! QUELQU'UN TENTE DE S'INTRODUIRe DANS LA RÈSERVE FÈDÈRALE !!!!!!
Key.Italian: !!!!!! QUALCUNO STA CERCANDO DI INTRODURSI NELLA RISERVA FEDERALE !!!!!!

Key.French: %1 was seen breaking into a house.
Key.English: %1 was seen breaking into a house.
Key.German: %1 wurde beim Einbruch in ein Haus gesehen.
Key.Original: %1 a été vu rentrant dans une maison par effraction.
Key.Italian: %1 è stato visto fare irruzione in una casa.

Key.French: There is no charge on the vault?
Key.English: There is no charge on the vault?
Key.German: Es gibt keine Ladung am Safe
Key.Original: Il n'y a pas de dynamite sur le coffre?
Key.Italian: Non c'è alcuna carica esplosiva sulla cassaforte
La carica esplosiva è stata disinnescata

Key.French: You need to look at the vehicle you want to refuel!
Key.English: You need to look at the vehicle you want to refuel!
Key.German: Du musst am Fahrzeug stehen um es zu betanken
Key.Original: Vous avez besoin de regarder le véhicule dont vous voulez faire le plein!
Key.Italian: Devi essere girato verso il veicolo che vuoi rifornire!

Key.French: You need to be closer to the vehicle!
Key.English: You need to be closer to the vehicle!
Key.German: Du musst näher am Fahrzeug sein
Key.Original: Vous devez être plus proche du véhicule!
Key.Italian: Devi stare più vicino al veicolo!

Key.French: This vehicle is already in your key-chain.
Key.English: This vehicle is already in your key-chain.
Key.Original: Ce véhicule est déjà dans votre porte-clé.
Key.Italian: Possiedi già le chiavi di questo veicolo.

Key.French: You got to far away from the target.
Key.English: You got to far away from the target.
Key.German: Du hast dich zu weit vom Ziel entfernt.
Key.Original: Vous êtes trop loin de la cible.

Key.French: You now have keys to this vehicle.
Key.English: You now have keys to this vehicle.
Key.German: Du hast nun einen Schlüssel zum Fahrzeug.
Key.Original: Vous avez maintenant les clés de ce véhicule
Key.Italian: Sei ora in possesso delle chiavi di questo veicolo.

Key.French: %1 was seen trying to lockpick a car.
Key.English: %1 was seen trying to lockpick a car
Key.German: %1 wurde gesehen wie er ein Auto knacken wollte.
Key.Original: %1 a été vu essayant de crocheter une voiture
Key.Italian: %1 è stato visto provare a scassinare un veicolo.

Key.French: You are not near a mine!
Key.English: You are not near a mine!
Key.German: Du bist nicht in der Nähe einer Mine!
Key.Original: Vous n'êtes pas près d'une mine!
Key.Italian: Non ti trovi vicino ad una mina!

Key.French: You can't mine from inside a car!
Key.English: You can't mine from inside a car!
Key.German: Du kannst nicht in deinem Auto abbauen!
Key.Original: Vous ne pouvez pas miner à l'intérieur d'une voiture!
Key.Italian: Non puoi piazzare mine da dentro un veicolo!

Key.French: You need to be inside your house to place this.
Key.English: You need to be inside your house to place this
Key.German: Du musst in deinem Haus sein
Key.Original: Vous devez être à l'interieur de votre maison pour placer ceci
Key.Italian: Devi essere all'interno della tua casa per posizionare questo.

Key.French: You cannot place any more storage containers in your house.
Key.English: You cannot place any more storage containers in your house.
Key.German: Es können keine weiteren Lagercontainer in dein Haus gestellt werden.
Key.Original: Vous ne pouvez pas placer d'autres conteneur dans votre maison.
Key.Italian: Non puoi installare altri contenitori in casa tua.

Key.French: No more free storage spaces in your house.
Key.English: No more free storage spaces in your house.
Key.German: Es ist kein Platz mehr für Lagercontainer.
Key.Original: Plus d'espace libre dans votre maison.
Key.Italian: I contenitori in casa tua hanno finito lo spazio disponibile.

Key.French: You need to stay within 10m to process.
Key.English: You need to stay within 10m to process
Key.German: Du musst innerhalb von 10m bleiben, um zu verarbeiten
Key.Original: Vous devez rester à 10m pour traiter

Key.French: You need $%1 to process without a license!
Key.English: You need $%1 to process without a license!
Key.German: Du brauchst $%1 um ohne eine Lizenz zu verarbeiten!
Key.Original: Vous devez $1% pour traiter sans permis!
Key.Italian: Hai bisogno di €%1 per processare senza la dovuta licenza!
Hai processato %1 in %2 al costo di €%3

Key.French: %1 has revived you and a fee of $%2 was taken from your bank account for their services.
Key.English: %1 has revived you and a fee of $%2 was taken from your bank account for their services.
Key.German: %1 hat dich wiederbelebt und eine Gebühr von $2% wurde von deinem Bankkonto für die Dienste abgehoben.
Key.Original: %1 vous à réanimé, les fraits de $%2 sont transféré depuit votre compte bancaire pour leurs services.
Key.Italian: %1 ti ha rianimato e sono stati prelevati €%2 dal tuo conto in banca per pagare la prestazione.

Key.French: Someone else is already reviving this person
Key.English: Someone else is already reviving this person
Key.German: Jemand anderes belebt diese Person bereits wieder
Key.Original: Quelqu'un d'autre s'occupe déjà de cette personne
Key.Italian: Qualcun'altro sta già provando a rianimare questa persona

Key.French: This person either respawned or was already revived.
Key.English: This person either respawned or was already revived.
Key.German: Diese Person ist entweder respawnt oder wurde bereits wiederbelebt.
Key.Original: Cette personne à soit réapparue, soit a déjà été réanimée.
Key.Italian: Questa persona è stata già rianimata o ha fatto respawn.

Key.French: You have revived %1 and received $%2 for your services.
Key.English: You have revived %1 and received $%2 for your services.
Key.German: Du hast %1 wiederbelebt und bekamst $%2 für deine Dienste.
Key.Original: Vous avez réanimé %1 vous avez reçu $%2 pour votre aide
Key.Italian: Hai rianimato %1 e hai ricevuto €%2 per la tua prestazione.

Key.French: You got to far away from the body.
Key.English: You got to far away from the body.
Key.German: Du bist zu weit weg vom Körper
Key.Original: Vous êtes trop loin du corps.
Key.Italian: Sei andato troppo distante dal corpo.

Key.French: The robbery has failed due to unknown reasons
Key.English: The robbery has failed due to unknown reasons
Key.Original: Le vol de la réserve fédérale a échoué pour des raisons inconnues
Key.Italian: La rapina è fallita per cause sconosciute

Key.French: $%1 was stolen from the robbery on the federal reserve
Key.English: $%1 was stolen from the robbery on the federal reserve
Key.German: $%1 wurden von den Räubern aus der Zentralbank gestohlen
Key.Original: $%1 a été volé à la réserve fédérale.
Key.Italian: €%1 sono stati rubati durante la rapina alla banca

Key.French: This vault is already being robbed by someone else
Key.English: This vault is already being robbed by someone else
Key.German: Der Tresor wird bereits von jemand anderem ausgeraubt
Key.Original: Ce coffre est déjà pillé par quelqu'un d'autre
Key.Italian: Questo Caveau sta venendo rapinando da qualcun'altro

Key.French: This vault was already robbed recently
Key.English: This vault was already robbed recently
Key.German: Der Tresor wurde bereits vor kurzem ausgeraubt
Key.Original: Ce coffre a déjà été pillé récemment
Key.Italian: Questo Caveau è stato svaligiato di recente

Key.French: Automatically reveals nearest objects within 15m, turn this setting off if you are experiencing performance issues.
Key.English: Automatically reveals nearest objects within 15m, turn this setting off if you are experiencing performance issues.
Key.German: Zeigt automatisch nächstgelegene Objekte innerhalb von 15m an, deaktiviere es wenn du Leistungprobleme hast.
Key.Original: Révèle automatiquement les objets les plus proches au sein de 15m, désactiver ce paramètre si vous rencontrez des problèmes de performance.
Key.Italian: Rivela automaticamente gli oggettivi vicini entro 15m, disattiva quest'impostazione se riscontri dei problemi di perfomance di sistema.

Key.French: Controls whether or not players will have name tags above their head.
Key.English: Controls whether or not players will have name tags above their head.
Key.German: regelt, ob die Spieler Namensschilder über dem Kopf haben.
Key.Original: Contrôle si les joueurs auront ou non leur noms au dessus de leur tête
Key.Italian: Controlla la visualizzazione delle tags sopra la testa dei giocatori

Key.French: Sending request to server for player information UID [%1]
Key.English: Sending request to server for player information UID [%1]
Key.German: Frage Spieler Informationen zu UID [%1] ab
Key.Original: Envoi de la requête au serveur pour obtenir des informations lecteur UID [%1]
Key.Italian: Invio richiesta al server per le informazioni del giocatore UID [%1]

Key.French: The server didn't find any player information matching your UID, attempting to add player to system.
Key.English: The server didn't find any player information matching your UID, attempting to add player to system.
Key.German: Der Server hat keine Spieler Informationen zu deiner UID gefunden, versuche Spieler ins System hinzuzufügen.
Key.Original: Le serveur n'a pas trouvé toutes les informations de lecteur correspondant à votre UID, tentative d'ajout du joueur dans le système.
Key.Italian: Il server non ha trovato alcuna informazione sul giocatore con il tuo UID, tentativo di aggiunta del giocatore al sistema.

Key.French: There was an error in trying to setup your client.
Key.English: There was an error in trying to setup your client.
Key.German: Es gab einen Fehler beim Versuch, den Client hinzuzufügen.
Key.Original: Il y avait une erreur en essayant de configurer votre client.
Key.Italian: C'è stato qualche errore nel cercare di inizializzare il tuo client

Key.French: You have already used the sync option, you can only use this feature once every 5 minutes.
Key.English: You have already used the sync option, you can only use this feature once every 5 minutes.
Key.German: Du hast bereits die Sync-Option verwendet, du kannst diese Funktion nur einmal alle 5 Minuten verwenden.
Key.Original: Vous avez déjà utilisé l'option de synchronisation, vous ne pouvez utiliser cette fonction une fois toutes les 5 minutes.
Key.Italian: Hai già utilizzato la funzione di salva dati, puoi usare quest'opzione solo una volta ogni 5 minuti.

Key.French: Because of some cheater corrupting the BIS MP Framework they have stopped you from enjoying our mission.\n\nYou can try this again in a minute if you feel it is a mistake.
Key.English: Because of some cheater corrupting the BIS MP Framework they have stopped you from enjoying our mission.\n\nYou can try this again in a minute if you feel it is a mistake.
Key.German: Wegen einiger Cheater ist das BIS MP Framework beschädigt. Versuche es in einer Minute nochmal.
Key.Original: En raison de certains tricheur tentant corrompre le BIS MP Framework,ils vous ont empêché de profiter de notre mission.\n\nVous pouvez essayer ce nouveau dans une minute si vous pensez que c'est une erreur.
Key.Italian: A causa di qualche cheater che ha corrotto il BIS MP Framework il tuo divertimento in questa missione finisce qui per ora.\n\nPuoi provare a rientrare a breve se pensi sia un errore.

Key.French: Syncing player information to the server.\n\nPlease wait up to 20 seconds before leaving.
Key.English: Syncing player information to the server.\n\nPlease wait up to 20 seconds before leaving.
Key.German: Synchronisieren der Spieler Informationen mit dem Server. \n\nBitte warte bis zu 20 Sekunden vor dem disconnecten.
Key.Original: Synchronisation des informations de joueur sur le serveur.\n\nS'il vous plaît veuiller attendre 20 secondes avant de quitter.
Key.Italian: Salvando le informazioni giocatore sul server.\n\nAttendere fino a 20 secondi prima di abbandonare.

Key.French: Because you robbed the bank you can't use the ATM for 5 minutes.
Key.English: Because you robbed the bank you can't use the ATM for 5 minutes.
Key.German: Da du die Bank ausgeraubt hast, kannst du für 5 Minuten keine ATM´s nutzen.
Key.Original: Vous avez pillé la banque, vous ne pouvez pas utiliser le guichet automatique pendant 5 minutes.
Key.Italian: Avendo appena rapinato la banca non puoi utilizzare il Bancomat per 5 minuti.

Key.French: You didn't choose the clothes you wanted to buy.
Key.English: You didn't choose the clothes you wanted to buy.
Key.German: Du hast nicht die Kleidung ausgewählt, die du kaufen wolltest
Key.Original: Vous n'avez pas choisi les vêtements que vous vouliez acheter.
Key.Italian: Non hai selezionato i vestiti che vuoi comprare.

Key.French: Sorry sir, you don't have enough money to buy those clothes.
Key.English: Sorry sir, you don't have enough money to buy those clothes.
Key.German: Es tut uns leid, du hast nicht genug Geld um es zu kaufen.
Key.Original: Désolé monsieur, vous n'avez pas assez d'argent pour acheter ces vêtements.
Key.Italian: Spiacente ma non hai fondi a sufficienza per comprare questi vestiti.

Key.French: There are no vehicles near to sell.
Key.English: There are no vehicles near to sell.
Key.German: Es ist keine Fahrzeug in der Nähe zum verkaufen.
Key.Original: Il n'y a pas de véhicules à proximité à vendre
Key.Italian: Nelle vicinanze non ci sono veicoli da vendere.

Key.French: There was a problem opening the chop shop menu.
Key.English: There was a problem opening the chop shop menu.
Key.German: Es gab ein Problem beim öffnen des Chop Shop-Menüs.
Key.Original: Il y a un probleme en ouvrant le menu du concessionnaire de véhicule illégal.
Key.Italian: C'è stato un problema aprendo il menu del ricettatore

Key.French: You need to be a civilian to use this store!
Key.English: You need to be a civilian to use this store
Key.German: Du musst ein Zivilist sein, um diesen Shop zu nutzen!
Key.Original: Vous devez être un civil pour utiliser ce magasin!
Key.Italian: Devi essere un civile per utilizzare questo negozio!

Key.French: You need to be a cop to use this store!
Key.English: You need to be a cop to use this store!
Key.German: Du musst ein Polizist sein, um diesen Shop zu nutzen!
Key.Original: Vous devez être un flic pour utiliser ce magasin!
Key.Italian: Devi essere un poliziotto per utilizzare questo negozio!

Key.French: You don't have rebel training yet!
Key.English: You don't have rebel training yet!
Key.Original: Vous n'avez pas encore d'entrainement rebelle!
Key.Italian: Devi essere ribelle per poter utilizzare questo negozio!

Key.French: You need a Diving license to use this shop!
Key.English: You need a Diving license to use this shop!
Key.German: Du benötigst eine Lizenz, um diesen Tauchershop zu nutzen!
Key.Original: Vous devez avoir votre diplome de plongée pour utiliser ce magasin!
Key.Italian: Ti serve la licenza di pesca per usare questo negozio!

Key.French: You need a %1 to buy from this shop!
Key.English: You need a %1 to buy from this shop!
Key.German: DU benötigst eine %1 um in diesem Shop zu kaufen!
Key.Original: Vous avez besoin de %1 pour acheter dans ce magasin
Key.Italian: Hai bisogno di %1 per comprare da questo negozio!

Key.French: There is currently a car there.
Key.English: There is currently a car there.
Key.Original: Il y a actuellement une voiture.

Key.French: You do not have enough money on you or in your bank to get your car back.
Key.English: You do not have enough money on you or in your bank to get your car back.
Key.German: Du hast nicht genug Geld um dein Auto auszuparken.
Key.Original: Vous n'avez pas assez d'argent sur vous ou dans votre banque pour obtenir votre voiture
Key.Italian: Non hai abbastanza fondi alla mano o nel tuo conto in banca per poter riavere il tuo veicolo.
Hai ritirato dal sequestro il tuo %1 al costo di €%3

Key.French: You did not pick a vehicle!
Key.English: You did not pick a vehicle!
Key.Original: Vous n'avez pas choisi de véhicule!

Key.French: You do not have enough cash to purchase this vehicle.\n\nAmount Lacking: $%1
Key.English: You do not have enough cash to purchase this vehicle.\n\nAmount Lacking: $%1
Key.German: Du hast nicht genug Geld um das Fahrzeug zu kaufen.\n\nEs fehlen: $%1
Key.Original: Vous n'avez pas assez d'argent pour acheter ce véhicule \n\nArgent Manquant: $%1
Key.Italian: Non hai fondi sufficienti per comprare questo veicolo.\n\nTi mancano: €%1

Key.French: You do not have the required license!
Key.English: You do not have the required license!
Key.German: Du hast nicht die benötigte Lizenz!
Key.Original: Vous n'avez pas la licence requise!
Key.Italian: Non hai la licenza richiesta per l'acquisto!

Key.French: There is a vehicle currently blocking the spawn point
Key.English: There is a vehicle currently blocking the spawn point
Key.German: Derzeit blockiert ein Fahrzeug den Spawn Punkt
Key.Original: Il y a actuellement un véhicule qui bloque le point de spawn
Key.Italian: C'è già un veicolo che blocca la zona di spawn
Hai comprato un %1 al costo di €%2

Key.French: You are not allowed to use this shop!
Key.English: You are not allowed to use this shop!
Key.German: Du bist nicht befugt diesen Shop zu nutzen
Key.Original: Vous n'êtes pas autorisé à utiliser cette boutique!
Key.Italian: Non sei autorizzato ad usare questo negozio!

Key.French: You need to select an item to buy.
Key.English: You need to select an item to buy.
Key.German: Du musst ein Item auswählen um es zu verkaufen.
Key.Original: Vous devez selectionner un objet pour l'acheter.
Key.Italian: Seleziona un oggetto per poterlo comprare.

Key.French: You didn't enter an actual number
Key.English: You didn't enter an actual number
Key.Original: Vous n'avez pas saisi un nombre réel
Key.Italian: Non hai inserito correttamente un numero

Key.French: You don't have that many items to sell!
Key.English: You don't have that many items to sell!
Key.German: Du hast nicht so viel zum verkaufen!
Key.Original: Vous n'avez pas autant d'articles à vendre!
Key.Italian: Non hai tutti quegli oggetti da vendere!

Key.French: The gang has enough funds to pay for this, would you like to pay with the gangs funds or your own?
Key.English: The gang has enough funds to pay for this, would you like to pay with the gangs funds or your own?
Key.German: Die Gang hat genügend Mittel, um dafür zu bezahlen, willst du es mit dem Gang Geld oder deinem eigenen Geld zahlen?
Key.Original: Le gang a suffisamment de fonds pour payer pour cela, voulez-vous payer avec les fonds de gangs ou les vôtres?
Key.Italian: La Gang ha fondi a sufficienza per pagare questo, vuoi usare i fondi della Gang o i tuoi personali?

Key.French: Pay with cash or gang funds
Key.English: Pay with cash or gang funds
Key.German: mit Bargeld oder mit Gang Geld bezahlen
Key.Original: Payez avec votre argent ou avec les fonds du gangs
Key.Italian: Paga con i tuoi contanti o i fondi della Gang

Key.French: You bought %1 %2 for $%3 with the gangs funds
Key.English: You bought %1 %2 for $%3 with the gangs funds
Key.German: Du kaufst %1 %2 für $%3 mit dem Gang Geld
Key.Original: Vous avez acheté %1 %2 pour $%3 avec les fonds gangs
Key.Italian: Hai comprato %1 %2 al costo di €%3 con i fondi della Gang

Key.French: You need to select an item to buy/sell.
Key.English: You need to select an item to buy/sell.
Key.German: Du musst ein Item auswählen zum kaufen/verkaufen
Key.Original: Vous devez sélectionner un élément pour acheter/vendre
Key.Italian: Devi selezionare un oggetto per comprare/vendere.

Key.Original: Vous avez vendu un %1 pour <t color='#8cff9b'>$%2</t>
Key.Italian: Hai venduto un %1 al prezzo di <t color='#8cff9b'>$%2</t>
